slides.title: How to $ave Dat Money
slides.description: Financial Advice from Lil Dicky and Fetty Wap

slides.title: I wear the same jeans everyday
I ain't never hit a bar with a cover
I ain't parkin' that unless the meters green, homie
Coppin sweaters in the summer when the sale on them
I get logins for the Netflix from my cousin Greg. Thanks Greg!
